name: venusaurite
effect: Held: Allows Venusaur to Mega Evolve into Mega Venusaur.
short_effect: Held: Allows Venusaur to Mega Evolve into Mega Venusaur.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Venusaur hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
